about.title: About Majunga
about.description: Majunga, or Mahajanga, is a fascinating port city located on the northwest coast of Madagascar. With its pleasant tropical climate and rich cultural heritage, it's an ideal destination for travelers seeking adventure and authenticity.
about.intro: Since 2015, we have been dedicated to sharing the natural beauty and rich culture of Majunga, Madagascar with travelers from around the world. Our passion is to create authentic experiences that connect visitors with the real Madagascar.
about.distinction: What sets us apart is our deep local knowledge and commitment to sustainable tourism. All our guides are native to Majunga with an in-depth understanding of the region's history, culture, and hidden treasures.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To showcase the beauty of Majunga while supporting local communities and preserving natural environments.
